A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Look\, I love Star Wars. I’ve always love the series since I was a little kid. When the force awakens came out I was blown away how they tied in the original series and kept the same feel but at the same time keeping the story simple and enjoyable. The last Jedi however is riddled with plug disasters too many things going on in the story. I was also surprised by some of the acting wasn’t up to par especially the character Rose. I thought her performance was Like a low-budget movie. I expect more in the Star Wars film. I have High hopes for the third in the series and hope that they go with a more simple story.
